description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. Now you can do what most 8-bit RPGs never let you! Court up to four lovely 8-bit ladies. Choose from a Princess, Elf, Thief or Item Shop Girl in this comical adventure. Be brave Sir Knight, you will get your 8-bit girlfriend!
description.short: Now you can do what most 8-bit RPGs never let you! Court up to four lovely 8-bit ladies. Choose from a Princess, Elf, Thief or Item Shop Girl in this comical adventure. Be brave Sir Knight, you will get your 8-bit girlfriend!
